post.body: Watch out for ice...I totally wiped out on the way to my final yesterday.
Thanks for my new name, Poppi! <3
Oh I feel you there...let's go find a yellow brick road...
a study partner with a fettish for....the 11th floor? talking nerdy? do tell...
Took her last final yesterday and needs people to waste time with cuz it's PARTY TIME!...who else is done?!
Lots and lots and coffee + BEER + Staying up all night studying + watching BSG = PARTAY!!!!!
is listening to her professors lectures online since he doesn't want to lecture in class and create more work....damn Kelley!
Is becoming delirious from all the sleep she's lost....
